youtube:
Txhawm rau nrhiav koj cov ntaub ntawv RTMP rau YouTube, nkag mus rau hauv koj tus account YouTube ces mus rau CREATE> Mus nyob. Tom qab ntawd koj yuav pom qhov screen hauv qab no:
{{youtubeLive}}
.Copy "kwj URL" thiab ntxig nws rau hauv "Paste RTMP URL ntawm no" teb. Tom ntej no, luam "Stream key" thiab muab tso rau hauv "Stream key" teb. Nyem "Go Live" los pib livestream.
{{rtmpLive}}
facebook:
Koj tuaj yeem kwj rau koj qhov profile ntawm RTMP los ntawm Facebook's Create Live page (thiab nyem Tsim Live Stream) lossis los ntawm nias lub pob Live nyob rau hauv Tsim thaj tsam ntawm nplooj ntawv lossis profile uas koj xav tau kwj. Koj yuav raug coj mus rau Facebook's Live Producer.
Scroll cia hauv qab lub preview player. Nco ntsoov nyob rau hauv "Get Started" uas cov ntawv qhia zaub mov poob yog teem rau Siv kwj yuam sij. Koj yuav pom RTMP URL thiab kwj yuam sij rau qhov chaw no. (Ceeb Toom: Koj cov yeeb yaj kiab saib ua ntej tseem pom nyob rau hauv qab ntawm lub ces kaum sab xis.) {{facebookLive}} Luam "Server URL" thiab ntxig rau hauv "Pste RTMP URL ntawm no" teb. Tom ntej no, luam "Stream key" thiab muab tso rau hauv "Stream key" teb. Nyem "Go Live" los pib livestream.
{{rtmpLive}}
